Articles.Content: Yay our civilization remains. everyone is welcome to come join us and have their own hill on Laythe. you just have to share the planet with us, not the hill.

Earthquake generator activated.

My shaking hill.

I return to Kerbin to see what I have done, and use the power of the multiverse to repair Kerbin. Unknown to me, the Sun just collided with Kerbol... But the Sun is only a few million tons heavier... \*mind explodes\*

I build a new hill in the 4th dimension.

My 4th dimensional hill.

I transcend the fourth dimension and take you hill by force.

My theoretical hill.
I simply destroy the fourth dimension of time and reboot it in order to keep peace. I am forced to lead life by this action. So, my hill.
I walk away and go play bagpipes on my hill in civilization. my invincible hill. (it's invincible because bagpipes.)

I restart the multiverse.

My hill democracy with peacekeeper army on Eve.

Screw peace, I set eve's explodium sea on fire, destroying your hill and the whole planet.

My Leftover Piece of Eve hill.

> 
> I restart the multiverse.
> My hill democracy with peacekeeper army on Eve.

... I'm still alive and fast-forward time to 4 billion years into the future and make your:

> 
> My hill democracy with peacekeeper army on Eve

hill collide with a star as the Milkomeda Galaxy is formed.

I convince Q that mere mortals should not meddle with space-time in such manner and talk him into restoring the original hill situation from post 1!

My vacant hill, as I travel the rest of the universe as Q's companion.

I ask for my hill back and offer to make a democracy.

My democratic hill.

Russian paratroopers are on the loose!

Communist hill.

> 
> Russian paratroopers are on the loose!
> Communist hill.

Are we on Earth, Kerbin or some other random place 3000000 gigaparsecs away?

- - - Updated - - -

And by the way, I teleported your Communist Army to the centre of the Sun.

- - - Updated - - -

And now I reset the universe to before anyone had a hill and I make my own hill.

I punch you off your hill.

My hill.

> 
> I punch you off your hill.
> My hill.

Why didn't I think of that?

I punch everyone who has had a hill. My hill.

I kick you off. 

My hill.

I build a 5 centimeter high hill.

My tiny hill.
I make a ring of hills with death turrets on them at the base of your hill and me in one of them so that I can protect your hill. Your hill and my smaller death hills protecting it.
I summon Kenin and Kalin, who create a Kommunist hill through a series of revolts. Our Kommunist hill.

Do you have flags?! But I do!

My hills then!

Uh...

No. I throw explosive lemonade at you, killing you.

My hill.
I still have a hill(s)
I dig out a secret underground base, and build a hill there.

NUKE EVERYTHING!

My crater.
